body.p:
To the Honble C D Pennybaker
Dear Sir

A petition was sent to His Excellency a short time since by Benj Freel to have his fine of Fifty doll' remitted for carrying concealed a deadly weapon, the particulars are set forth in it his father requests me to ask yr aid to this business by calling on the Govr & asking his favorable consideration, they are both Father & son residents of the 8th Ward & your constituents ,will you please attend to this business the young man has been in the workhouse 14 or 15 days he has also paid the costs with great respect I am sir yr obt Servt
I respectfully call your attention to the purport of this letter -- It will do no good to keep this young man in the work house he can make nothing there --
